name: Neopolitan End Times
description:
https://www.coregames.com/games/56b21f/neopolitan-end-times

The end times have come; the world is truly doomed. The old ones from beyond have come to destroy our world in a relentless tide of Neopolitan destruction. Collect all 15 coins and see the sweet world we must now inhabit from the monsters beyond. They are always watching and waiting, and they number in billions. In this bullet hell watch as chaos reigns from above.
